doc.title: ieat Pizza Making Workshop
doc.text: Photos/VBD by/IN ijeff/NN -/: many/JJ thanks/NNS !/. Remember/. I/PRP was/VBD telling/VBG you/PRP about/IN the/DT 1/CD minute/NN pizza/NN dough/NN ?/. Well/RB ,/, our/JJ kakis/NNS managed/VBD to/TO get/VB to/TO try/VB it/PRP out/VB at/IN the/DT Mayer/JJ Live/NN Kitchen/NN at/IN Orchard/NN Central/NN last/JJ Saturday/NN ./. Once/IN you/PRP learn/VBP how/RB to/TO make/VB your/PRP$ own/JJ pizza/NN base/NN ,/, the/DT sky/NN is/VBZ really/RB the/DT limit/NN on/IN what/WP you/PRP can/MD put/VB on/IN the/DT pizza/NN ./. Some/DT of/IN the/DT very/RB creative/JJ pizzas/NN that/WDT came/VBD out/IN that/WDT afternoon/NN were/VBD Cactuskit/RB 's/POS Kaya/NN and/CC Avocado/NN pizza/NN ,/, Muah/NNP Otah/NNP pizza/NNP and/CC Holydrummer/NNP 's/POS Unagi/NN pizza/NN ./. There/EX was/VBD also/RB a/DT Bacon/NN and/CC Egg/NN with/IN Brie/JJ cheese/NN pizza/NN which/WRB was/VBD pretty/RB good/JJ ./. I/PRP think/VB we/PRP did/VBD get/VB carried/PRP away/RB with/IN our/PRP$ last/JJ pizza/NN when/WRB we/PRP put/VB a/DT whole/JJ block/JJ of/IN Brie/NN Cheese/NN on/IN the/DT pizza/NN and/CC the/DT whole/JJ thing/NN became/VBD a/DT calorie/NN bomb/NN !/. Besides/IN the/DT pizza/NN ,/, Champagne/NN also/RB demonstrated/VBZ how/RB easy/RB it/PRP was/VBD to/TO make/VB Cookies/NN and/CC Cream/NN Ice/NN Cream/NN with/IN the/DT Cuisinart/JJ Ice/NN Cream/NN maker/NN ./. It/PRP 's/VBZ all/RB a/DT matter/NN of/IN putting/JJ everything/NN into/IN the/DT machine/NN and/CC turning/VB it/PRP on/IN ./. Many/JJ thanks/NNS to/TO Champagne/VB for/IN helping/NN to/TO organize/VB the/DT session/NN and/CC to/TO everyone/VB who/WP so/RB enthusiastically/RB brought/VBN the/DT toppings/NNS for/IN the/DT pizza/NN !/. Thanks/DT also/RB to/TO Mayer/VB Live/NN Kitchen/NN at/IN Orchard/NN Central/NN for/IN allowing/NN us/PRP to/TO use/VB their/PRP$ premises/NNS for/IN our/PRP$ session/NN !/. Oh/EX BTW/NN ,/, we/PRP will/MD be/VB auctioning/VBD a/DT Pizza/NN Peel/NN at/IN our/PRP$ ieat/JJ AGM/NN this/DT Friday/NN !/. So/RB if/IN you/PRP are/VBP keen/JJ to/TO make/VB your/PRP$ own/JJ pizza/NN ,/, get/VB your/PRP$ wallet/NN ready/JJ on/IN Friday/NN to/TO bid/VB for/IN it/PRP !/. -LRB-/DT All/PDT proceeds/NNS are/VBP donated/VBN to/TO Charity/VB -RRB-/RB
